titleStmt.title: A publike declaration and solemne protestation of the free-men of England and Wales, against the illegall, intollerable, undoing grievance of free-quarter.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Feb: 7th"; the 8 in imprint date has been crossed out and date has been altered to 1647.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
